subject: Order Ssn1721
description_text:
Hi i bought the pro x ultra pedals with haptic motors. I have everything
hooked up and working but i am getting an input from a "x rotation" and i
don't know what that is. Also when i plug the haptic power cord into the
control box i get a big spark from the outlet. Any help would be greatly
appreciated.

Thanks
Sam Forrest

conversations.body_text: Hi Sam Forrest,  In the “Settings - Update” section, click “Manual Firmware Update,” then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder → and select the proxultra.sfu file to update. This firmware will disable the 4th axis.      Additionally, seeing a spark when plugging the 24V power supply into the control board is normal—it's caused by the capacitors charging. It won't affect performance or cause any damage, so please don’t worry.
